name: Pyxis Tankers Inc.
description: Pyxis Tankers Inc. is an international shipping company primarily engaged in the transportation of refined petroleum products and bulk liquids. Founded in 2013 and based in Athens, Greece, Pyxis Tankers operates a fleet of modern tanker vessels that specialize in the transportation of clean petroleum products including gasoline, diesel, and jet fuel. The company's fleet is equipped with state-of-the-art technology and adheres to high standards of safety and environmental protection. With a commitment to operational excellence and customer satisfaction, Pyxis Tankers aims to provide reliable and efficient shipping solutions to its clients. The company focuses on maintaining a young and efficient fleet, ensuring compliance with international regulations and standards. As the global demand for energy products continues to evolve, Pyxis Tankers is well-positioned to adapt and respond to market changes, aiming to maximize shareholder value while promoting sustainability in the shipping industry.
